description: This file defines a React functional component named LearningAssistant, which renders a chat-style UI panel with header controls, a message list, quick suggestion buttons, and a message input area. It appears to be part of a larger educational platform, providing an accessible interface for a virtual learning assistant.

methods.name: LearningAssistant()
methods.description: A React functional component that renders the Learning Assistant UI panel with static messages and suggested actions.
